explains: n. 可能的影响（或作用、结果）；含意，暗指；牵连，涉及
wordGroup: by implication 含蓄地；暗示地

sentences.en: The implication was plain, if left unstated.
sentences.cn: 即使不说出来，隐含义也很明显。

sentences.en: Implication in a murder finally brought him to the gallows.
sentences.cn: 与一桩谋杀案的牵连最终把他送上了绞刑架。

sentences.en: They resent the implication that they have behaved irresponsibly.
sentences.cn: 他们对那种暗示他们的行为不负责任的言论非常不满。
